verbose_text: CTGF delivery in full transected rat patellar tendon (PT) led to reconstruction of collagen orientation and mechanical properties similar to the native PT by regulating proliferation and tenogenic differentiation of endogenous TSCs via FAK and ERK1/2 pathway XREF_BIBR.
evidence: CTGF delivery in full-transected rat patellar tendon (PT) led to reconstruction of collagen orientation and mechanical properties similar to the native PT by regulating proliferation and tenogenic differentiation
